climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Package includes: you will get 8 pieces extra hard toothbrushes in 4 different colors, each color has 2 pieces; This quantity is sufficient and convenient for you to share with your friends, your family, your guests and so on

Reliable material: the bristles of these extra firm toothbrushes are made of quality nylon material, which is harder and firmer, stable in structure and not easy to deform; These brushes will serve you for a long time

Classic colors: there are 4 different colors for you to choose, including blue, red, pink, yellow; You can choose the color according to your favor; And 4 different colors are easy to distinguish which avoid taking the wrong tooth when your family share these huge head toothbrushes set together

Longer bristles: the thickness of the bristle is approx. 1.3 cm/ 0.5 inch and the height of bristle is approx. 4.2 cm/ 1.7 inch, which is thicker and longer; That's to say, these manual toothbrushes are available to get between tight spaces and hard to reach areas which have a good effect on cleaning tooth stain

Use range: these whitening teeth toothbrushes are suitable for those people who are accustomed to hard toothbrushes; And if you have tea stains on your teeth, this toothbrush is suitable for you; And in order to protect your gums, please use less strength when you clean your teeth with these hard toothbrushes, and you will also get nice clean effects; And you also can use these brushes to clean some corners of your home

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large Quantity, Can Meet Your Family Needs Plastic Non-slip Grip, Easy to Hold Quality Nylon Material, Harder And Firmer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They Clean REALLY Good!!
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually give reviews but had to on this one. As other people have said, they are oversized somewhat and take some time to get used too. I've been looking for tooth brushes like this for years because they don't make good thick ones like when I was younger. Out of the box, yes, you could use one to clean tile grout!. Perhaps that's a secondary use to buy them but they work on teeth too. The first week you have to brush lightly with them. After that they soften up enough but still remain firm. They work amazingly, the best tooth brush I've found in over 20 years! My teeth are noticeably cleaner from just regular brushing than they been in a long time. The brushes get deep down into the gum area like a floss too. Highly recommended and the package of 8 will last a LONG time because they don't soften up too much and go flat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these! Best firm toothbrush I've found

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice size. Handle not comfortable. Wore out quickly and bristles fell out. Almost too big to fit into brush holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall Great! I wish they had an option for a normal sized head. It was a little long and takes a little getting used to. Bristles are strong as I wanted. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I had to go to review to make sure if this is for brushing teeth or cleaning tools😃😃
reviews.reviewText: I hope I’m not going to loose my teeth after using it. I felt like I’m brushing my teeth with iron wired brush. I used it 3 days and every time I use it, my gum is bloody, but some reviews says it’ll take a weeks to be getting used to it so I’m using it till I get used to it or till my last teeth remains in my mouth🤣🤣.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I could give -0 if I could. I had a horribleness with this brand. The brush keeps breaking after a couple of days. I don't have words to explain how frustrated I am right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item as described
reviews.reviewText: I received exactly what I expected. There were 8 extra hard full head toothbrushes. I purchased these for cleaning items with small crevices. These work great. The handle is comfortable and easy to hold on to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super big & firm
reviews.reviewText: These are better than I had expected. I’m 57 and am missing several teeth-getting extractions, posts placed and general dental care. These get way back in the very back of my top and bottom rows of teeth. The bristles are a bit longer than regular bristles. I was not expecting this toothbrush to be as firm and easy to use. I have arthritis in my hands, so the toothbrush being large helps me to navigate around in my mouth. Im happy that I ordered the 5 pack (i think), I gave one to my caregiver-roommate-supervisor.Im still using my original toothbrush, very firm-Love these!Excellent Product!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Están fuertes pero muy fácil de romperse
reviews.reviewText: Muy fácil de romperse pero el diente del cepillo muy buen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: They get to the part you want to clean
reviews.reviewText: At first when you use this brush you will automatically think this brush is too big and too hard to use but don't be fooled, as if you use it for a while before you judge it, you'll soon find it seems to be getting the stains off your back teeth and although at first I was very gentle (as it's a hard brush) when cleaning my teeth now I'm pressing harder and it's cleaning them back to a more whiter colour, it is more difficult to clean the inside of one teeth but you get there in the end with perseverance, I even have seen one of my teeth bleeding once, just a small amount, but it soon stops the more you clean them with this hard brush
Pour éliminer le tartre, c'est une brosse à dents à poils durs qu'il faut. Cette marque est très solide et dure très longtemps. Par contre, le manche est un peu court.

Sono spazzolini che si rifanno a quelli degli anni 30 e 40. Enormi. Io li trovo ottimi per fare una pulizia decente. Un pochino troppo duri appena nuovi, diventano ottimi dopo qualche giorno e ammorbidite le setole. Visto il prezzo dei competitors prezzo più che giusto. Spedizione velocissima.
Zum reinigen der Dritten perfekt.Auch sehr gut im Haushalt verwendbar.
